participant_1.background:
I want a home with a secure bike parking space and a place to plug in my tablet.
My social media presence is part of my job, so I try to keep it up-to-date and interesting.
I am too strict with my soldiers, sometimes I make them do things that are too dangerous.
I work 60 hours a week so I can't go to the game, but I'll be cheering from home!
I still play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape.

participant_2.background:
I relax by watching horror movies with my favorite snacks and enjoy my tattoos.
I love to ride my bike and get ice cream with my grandpa.
I have to study for my nursing exam this weekend, but I'm looking forward to relaxing outside with my friends after I'm finished.
I do not wish to disclose my marital status.
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.

content.text: Hello, how are you?
Hello, I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking. What do you do for a living?
I'm a nurse. I work 60 hours a week, but I love it!
That's great! I'm a soldier. I have to work a lot too, but it's worth it.
What do you like most about being a soldier?
I love the camaraderie and the sense of purpose. I also like getting to travel and see new places.
That sounds really exciting! I'm not sure if I could handle the long hours, but I'm glad you enjoy your job.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it's the best job in the world for me.
Well, I'm sure you're great at it!
Thank you! I try my best.
So, what are your hobbies?
I like to play the drums, ride my bike, and watch horror movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love horror movies too.
Me too! I have a whole collection of them.
I'm more of a casual fan, but I do love a good horror movie.
What's your favorite horror movie?
I'm not sure I have a favorite, but I really like The Conjuring.
That's a good one! I've seen it a few times.
Me too! It's so scary!
I know, right? I love it!
Me too!
Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope you have a great day!
You too!
